Instruction: Mix the milk and vinegar in a bowl; let it stand until the milk sours, approximately 5 minutes.
Mix the milk and vinegar in a bowl and let it sit for about 5 minutes until the milk sours.

Cook the cornbread in a greased skillet over medium heat until bubbles form on the surface, about 2-3 minutes. Flip with a spatula and cook until the other side is browned, around 1-2 minutes. Repeat until all batter is used.
